card.name: Red
card.text: [+1]: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put all Pokémon cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. [−3]: You may put a Pokémon card from your hand onto the battlefield. [−7]: For each Pokémon you control, create a token that's a copy of that Pokémon.

card.name: Blue
card.text: [+2]: Remove all status counters from up to 1 target Pokémon. You gain 1 life for each counter removed this way. [-3]: Discard a card, then return a Pokémon from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. [−7]: Pokémon you control get +3/+3 and gain lifelink, indestructible, haste, vigilance, and hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Green
card.text: [+1]: Each player searches their library for an artifact card, puts it into their hand, and shuffles their library. [-2]: Return an enchantment or artifact from your graveyard to your hand. [−5]: For each Pokémon you control, search your library for a TM card and put it onto the battlefield enchanting that Pokémon. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Brock
card.text: [+1]: Target Pokémon gets +2/+2 until end of turn. [−2]: Search your library for a Rock or Ground card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. [−4]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, put two +1/+1 counters on it."

card.name: Misty
card.text: [+1]: Tap or untap target Pokémon. [−1]: Target Water Pokémon gains unblockable until end of turn. [−6]: Draw 2 cards for each Pokémon you control.

card.name: Lt. Surge
card.text: [+1]: Target Pokémon gains vigilance and haste until end of turn. [−3]: Put a paralyze counter on each Pokémon your opponents control. You gain 1 life for each paralyze counter added this way. [−6]: Target Pokémon gains indestructible until end of turn. Deal 12 damage to each Pokémon.

card.name: Erika
card.text: [+1]: Add G, U or W. [x2]: Reveal your hand. You gain 1 life for each Pokémon card revealed this way. [−X]: Pokémon you control get +X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Koga
card.text: [+1]: Put a confusion counter on target Pokémon. [+2]: Put a poison counter on target Pokémon. You gain life equal to the number of poison counters on that Pokémon. [−6]: You get an emblem with "Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a Pokémon they control with a poison counter on it, you gain that much life."

card.name: Sabrina
card.text: [+1]: Reveal the top card of target player's library. [-2]: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card fourth from the top. [-4]: Target player discards a card, then each player draws cards equal to the number of cards in their hand.

card.name: Blaine
card.text: [+0]: Target Pokémon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. [+0]: Draw a card, then discard a card. [−3]: You get an emblem with "Medicine spells you cast have flash."

card.name: Giovanni
card.text: [+1]: Draw a card. You lose 1 life for each card in your hand. [+0]: Each player sacrifices a Pokémon or Trainer. [-8]: Each player discards their hand. Put all Pokémon cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Bill
card.text: Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Pokéball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Switch
card.text: Return target Pokémon you control to its owner's hand. If you do, put a Pokémon with equal or lesser converted mana cost from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Master Ball
card.text: Look at the top 7 cards of your library. You may reveal a Pokémon card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Stonefinder Radar
card.text: Search your library for a Stone card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Pokéflute
card.text: Remove all sleep counters from all Pokémon.

card.name: Bubble Blower
card.text: Search your library for a Water card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Revive
card.text: Return target Pokémon card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Put a paralyze counter on it.

card.name: Max Revive
card.text: Return target Pokémon card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Energy Search Mk2
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put it on the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Gambler
card.text: Shuffle your hand into your library. Flip a coin. If heads, draw 3 cards.

card.name: Mysterious Fossil
card.text: Search your library for a card named Omanyte or Kabuto and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Potion
card.text: Remove all damage from target Pokémon.

card.name: Tri Attack
card.text: Put a paralyze counter on target Pokémon. Put a burn counter on target Pokémon. Put a frozen counter on target Pokémon.

card.name: Weather Control Device
card.text: Shuffle target land you control into your library. If you do, search your library for a basic land card and put it into play. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: PlusPower
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +1/+1 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Psych Up
card.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target Pokémon.

card.name: Forced Adaptation
card.text: Evolve target Pokémon, then it fights target Pokémon.

card.name: Devolution Spray
card.text: Exile target Pokémon, then return it to battlefield under its owner’s control. That Pokémon can’t activate evolve abilities this turn.

card.name: Item Finder
card.text: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Versus Seeker
card.text: Each player searches their library for a card, reveals it, shuffles their library, and puts that card on top.
